sentences.english: Even if not to stay, so grand luxury Memorial also to be a trip.
sentences.chinese: 即使留不住，如此隆重奢華的祭奠也算不虛此行吧。

sentences.english: I hope this lecture made everyone feel regret it.
sentences.chinese: 我希望這個講座讓每個人感覺到不虛此行。

sentences.english: The trip to the station felt long but it was worth it.
sentences.chinese: 飛往空間站的行程雖然漫長，但不虛此行。

sentences.english: Immersed in the ceramic culture and rhyme flow, let you sigh not straight.
sentences.chinese: 沉浸在陶瓷文化的脈脈流韻中，直讓你感嘆不虛此行。

sentences.english: and it makes for a really nice day out.
It seemed to be especially worthwhile to everyone who went.
sentences.chinese: 對於每一位去過的人好像特別有不虛此行的感覺。
